channel.title: Srl-forums down
channel.description: I keep trying to get onto it periodically, but opendns keeps saying it isn't loading, so is srl-forums down right now, or did something happen to the site causing it to be down for the past few days, or is it just me, because i've tried linking a few people to the site and the same thing happens where it won't load.

item.title: Srl-forums down
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

IP-Drowner:

Also, you said in the “General Site Discussion” forum, that the shoutbox will be based on post-count to prevent spamming or whatever. I suggest you get what you say, right.

Right back at you.

Aryan 372 by Nerice

Also, for those who’re wondering why the shoutbox is gone, it’s now only available to more frequent visitors of the forums to recude the big amount of pointless spam in it.

Anyway, this topic has gone completely off-topic, locked.

Read full topic

item.title: Srl-forums down
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

[quote=“Freddy1990, post:13, topic:213112”][quote author=IP-Drowner link=topic=280564.msg2298268#msg2298268 date=1214498582]

Ih8 it but its true they are dow but they wil pobly wont come back till start of nexr month
resouse: http://freddy1990.com/forums/index.php
shout box

No, don’t go to Freddies website. He’ll ban you for no-reason at all, AT ALL! And the shout-box can only be seen by users that have a post count of 5 (or 10 i think) or higher.
[/quote]
Actually, I believe you’re the third person I’ve ever banned, I don’t ban people without a reason, you’re the most annoying person I’ve ever met, I’ve warned you several times and you’ve chosen to ignore the warnings on every occasion.
And access to the shoutbox isn’t determined by postcount at all, maybe get your facts straight.[/quote]
You have warned me only twice, not several. And to that reason why you think you banned me is wrong, i have never used an IRC channel before so, yes i am an idiot at IRC. I typed in /MasterKill Contact Freddy here: Freddy-Email-Here as he never replys to his public one (which you don’t). And how am i annoying, please explain. I have only ever annoyed you about five times, and i say was a joke and you say that you get sick and tired of it, even though it is just for fun. Do you have to take everything so seriously?

Also, you said in the “General Site Discussion” forum, that the shoutbox will be based on post-count to prevent spamming or whatever. I suggest you get what you say, right.

Read full topic

item.title: Srl-forums down
item.dc:creator: @hy71194 hy71194
item.description:
@hy71194 wrote:

[quote=“Wizzup?, post:25, topic:213112”][quote author=hy71194 link=topic=280564.msg2299342#msg2299342 date=1214536494]
But I just remembered what this was mostly about: MABTW.com. Wizzy posted link, I said I disagree (the site is very sexist twords women, it says men are better than women in everything, etc) and he got pissed at me and whatever.
[/quote]

That is just utterly wrong. Haha. I never said such things, and I’d never get pissed on because of that site because I find it rather ridiculous, yet funny. I never said I agreed with that guy. Keep making it all up.[/quote]
NOW who is the liar?? You said you did multuple times to [-jesus-], Jason2gs, etc. It is sad when I even start to see you lying just to uphold your rep on a not-very important subject. tut,tut,tut…

FFS, I’ll even post more IRC logs with you and I if I can find them on my computer.

We can just stop this as Icefire said…

Read full topic

item.title: Srl-forums down
item.dc:creator: @icefire908 icefire908
item.description:
@icefire908 wrote:

[quote=“hy71194, post:23, topic:213112”][quote author=icefire908 link=topic=280564.msg2299275#msg2299275 date=1214533653]
I think you should un-ban him and forget any of this ever happened and be friends, but that’s just my 2 cents.

Better to forgive and forget than to revenge and grudge.
[/quote]

Lol, goes to “Hy is a bitch” to “Hy is a good kid, leave him alone” O well.

That is a good idea though.

But I just remembered what this was mostly about: MABTW.com. Wizzy posted link, I said I disagree (the site is very sexist twords women, it says men are better than women in everything, etc) and he got pissed at me and whatever.

But yeah, I forgive Wizzy for anything he might have done, and I hope he forgives me for anything I did and we can just be “friends, but not friends”, just indifferent to each other.[/quote]

Glad to hear.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

[quote=“hy71194, post:17, topic:213112”]Just to set everything straight… from my POV:
http://www.hy71194.mgatesphoto.com/Scripts/Caver/WhereDidItGo

Me and wizzup also had an interesting convo on IRC too… http://www.hy71194.mgatesphoto.com/other/wizz.txt Sorry for all the little squares, I copied it off my IRC which uses color codes = squares on notepad.

Edit: The saddest part about this is it started over nothing - a ban from #SRL for doing nothing wrong, then it just grew into this.[/quote]
Hy… I don’t see how that convo is supposed to be in your favor

item.title: Srl-forums down
item.dc:creator: @icefire908 icefire908
item.description:
@icefire908 wrote:

Hy71194 says: That is not why I am quitting. Hy71194 says: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,280564.msg2299151.html#msg2299151 Wizzy acts like a whore to me all the time for no reason at all. Read that link and the links in my post. IceFire908 says: Oh, you're saying goodbye because you're quitting. Hy71194 says: yes IceFire908 says: Wow, that's why you're quitting? IceFire908 says: You're a little bitch. Hy71194 says: rofl bother to read anything he wrote? IceFire908 says: Not yet, I'm getting there hang on. Hy71194 says: the chat log says a lot about it. Hy71194 says: Don't call someone a bitch until you know the whole story. IceFire908 says: Reading... IceFire908 says: Wow, you're a little bitch. IceFire908 says: I'm quiting,, wah wah wah, booo hoo. Damn dude how old are you?

Pretty much.

Hy71194 says: I kinda also quit cuz I was banned IceFire908 says: You deserved to be banned, all you do is complain damn.

Yep…

IceFire908 says: I used to respect you to. Damn. Hy71194 says: dude, piss off, you sound like you didn't even read the whole thing, nor the log he sent. He is the one attacking me, and I haven't ever said "waah poor me".. Hy71194 says: whaever. IceFire908 says: It doesn't matter, you don't go and be a little bitch and say I' IceFire908 says: m quitting.

mmmhmmm.

Hy71194 says: uhm, i was actually just trying to save my ass from a ban I saw was comming <_< IceFire908 says: Yea, well, you fail miserably then.

End of story… wait nope…

Hy71194 says: explain how I could have done it without being a "bitch" then. IceFire908 says: You really want to know? Because you're taking a lot of offense to what I've said so far. Hy71194 says: No I am not really Hy71194 says: just tell me. IceFire908 says: The easiest way is to apologize even if you didn't do anything just to avoid getting in trouble. This is pretty much if you IceFire908 says: 're lazy and don't feel like talking. IceFire908 says: The second way takes a little more work and requires you to actually try and reason with the other person instead of fighting them. Hy71194 says: Lol, then he just pings me to death. Hy71194 says: and I did try.. IceFire908 says: Probably because you harrass eachother, it's called a fight.

ugh…

Hy71194 says: Well, it wouldn't have been a fight if wizzy would have reasoned with me at begining instead of saying "piss off ur annoying" like that, only in different words.. IceFire908 says: No, it wouldn't have been a fight if you had just ignored "piss off ur annoying" and done something else instead of escalate the fight. It's just as much your fault as it is his.

Read full topic

#Wizzup. says: I don't want to hear from this pathetic piece of shit! #Wizzup. says: He just acts like an ass, and I ban people who act like that #Wizzup. says: Nothing against Hy71194, except for the fact he is just asking for a ban, and it just happened

Any anyone who just thinks I am acting like a pussy about it can piss off coughIceFire908*/cough* Thanks for your time!

EDIT: I also second that Freddy is right when it comes to IP-Drowner’s case.
EDIT2: Join srl’s irc for the latest info.

freenode.net (#srl), Hop by whenever you want to get the latest info on SRL’s current down-state.
